article_title: Hamas officials leave Gaza truce talks without deal
sentence: The  war  in  Gaza  began  when  Hamas  fighters  stormed  into  southern  Israel  on  7  October,  killing  about  1,200  people  and  seizing  253  hostages,  according  to  Israeli  tallies.

article_title: Hamas officials leave Gaza truce talks without deal
sentence: More  than  30,800  people  have  been  killed  in  Gaza  since  then,  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry  says.

article_title: Hamas officials leave Gaza truce talks without deal
sentence: Israeli  officials  have  said  that  at  least  30  of  them  are  dead.
